text: welcome to Sierra Leone and this Ebola

remember the symptoms of Ebola include
diarrhea they include nausea high fever
and those kinds of problems which are
very similar to malaria so you can have
malaria and be a suspected Ebola victim
so they have to be separated from those
who actually do have the virus and at

being mixed together and that of course

here just on the right-hand side are
where the confirmed cases are kept and
for them it's important that they are
rehydrated and given proper nutrition if
those two things can be kept in balance
then their chances of recovery are
